Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.search.LeafFieldComparator

  • Packages that use LeafFieldComparator 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.search
    Code to search indices.
    org.apache.lucene.search.comparators
    Comparators, used to compare hits so as to determine their sort order when collecting the top results with TopFieldCollector.

    • Uses of LeafFieldComparator in org.apache.lucene.search

      Classes in org.apache.lucene.search that implement LeafFieldComparator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FieldComparator.RelevanceComparator
      Sorts by descending relevance.
      static class  FieldComparator.TermOrdValComparator
      Sorts by field's natural Term sort order, using ordinals.
      static class  FieldComparator.TermValComparator
      Sorts by field's natural Term sort order.
      class  SimpleFieldComparator<T>
      Base FieldComparator implementation that is used for all contexts.
